## Summary

- Geomean forward GFLOPS speedup vs CPU best-profile-per-case: **1.60x**
- Geomean backward GFLOPS speedup vs CPU best-profile-per-case: **1.72x**
- Geomean forward latency speedup vs CPU best-profile-per-case: **1.61x**
- Geomean backward latency speedup vs CPU best-profile-per-case: **1.82x**
